templates.content: To track your order, you can log in to your Jaanuu account, where you can view tracking details under "Account/Orders" or check the shipping confirmation email for a tracking link. Hope this helps!
templates.name: How can I track my order?

templates.content: Great question! Log in to your Jaanuu account using your registered email and password. Once you do, click here: https://jaanuu.attn.tv/akHJt3FRsEYq to see your available store credit. It will automatically apply to your purchase upon checkout.
templates.name: How can I access my store credit?

templates.content: FUSEryxTM is made from a combination of poly, rayon, and spandex, while SPINryxTM combines rayon, nylon, and spandex.

templates.content: Currently, our exchanges are limited to the exchange of sizes & colors within the same product. We can't exchange for other products. If you'd like to exchange for another product, please select store credit for your return. Once your return is processed, store credit will be added to your account allowing you to purchase the desired product. You may visit this link for more info: https://jaanuu.attn.tv/sl/cKoWE-95
templates.name: Can I exchange an item for a different product?

templates.content: We have revamped and streamlined the design features of our products and much improved revolutionary fabric that's technically advanced compared to our existing fabrics. These fabrics are more durable, comfortable, and breathable, and replace our previous woven and knit fabrics. We moved to more performance-focused design styles. We use premium fabric with an antimicrobial finish.
templates.name: Did you change your fabric?

templates.content: Our scrubs (and masks) fabric is treated with an antimicrobial technology SilvadurTM, which protects the fabric and fibers so they last longer. It also inhibits the growth of microorganisms in the fabric.
templates.name: What is an antimicrobial finish?

templates.content: We recommend that you use non-chlorine detergent and machine wash inside out on cold (with like colors). Do not dry clean. Tumble dry on low or hang dry. If needed, turn the garment inside out and iron on low heat.
templates.name: How do I care for my Jaanuu apparel?

templates.content: Our masks aren't a replacement for medical-grade protective equipment, and shouldn't be used in place of other recommended measures to inhibit the spread of COVID-19. Please continue to follow CDC guidelines, practice social distancing, hand-washing, avoid touching your face, and obey shelter-at-home orders.
templates.name: Are these masks the surgical type? Can they protect against the virus?

templates.content: We're currently shipping within the 50 states of the US, Guam, Puerto Rico, Virgin Islands, and Canada. We're assessing the demand for possibly offering international shipping. Hopefully, we can expand our coverage in the near future!
templates.name: Where do you ship to? / International shipping

templates.content: To cancel your order, please go to "My Orders", enter your order ID number, email address, and cancel the order - https://www.jaanuu.com/my-account/guest_order Please note that changes can only be made to an order within 30 min. from when it was submitted. We also can't add items to an existing order. What's the order number and the change you'd like to make?
templates.name: Cancel / edit order

templates.content: Please allow 6-8 days for your return to be processed. We'll send you an email confirmation once your refund has been completed. Once your refund is complete, please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear back on your original payment method.
templates.name: How long does it take to process my return?

templates.content:
Please note that all of our fabrics are treated with SilvadurTM antimicrobial finished technology for enhanced protection. ULTRALiteTM is our lightest fabric that's unlike anything you've ever felt before. It allows maximum airflow, it's wrinkle-resistant and fade resistant and it's made from 92% recycled poly and 8% spandex. 

SPINryxTM is the softest knit fabric solution to enter the game of scrubs. It provides all-day breathability for enhanced performance and soaks up moisture to keep you cool in the heat and warm in the cold. It's made from 65% rayon, 30% nylon, and 5% spandex.

FUSEryxTM is constructed with 4-way stretch properties for superior comfort and durability. It's wrinkle-resistant and fade resistant and it's made from 76% poly, 18% rayon, and 6% spandex.
templates.name: What are your fabrics?

templates.content: Our core colors for men's scrubs are Black, Navy, Gray, Royal Blue, Wine, Caribbean Blue, and Ceil Blue. Our core colors for women's scrubs are Black, Navy, Gray, Royal Blue, Wine, Caribbean Blue, Ceil Blue, White and Blushing pink.
templates.name: What are your core colors?

templates.content: The Mila ULTRAsoft Yoga Scrub Pant and the Perri ULTRAsoft Yoga Scrub Pant are made from the same material and have a similar look but offer different fits. The Mila ULTRAsoft pants have a slim fit that follows the natural lines of the body without being too tight. The Perri ULTRAsoft scrub pants, on the other hand, have a skinny fit, offering a closer and tighter fit.
templates.name: What is the difference between the Mila ULTRAsoft Yoga Scrub Pant and the Perri ULTRAsoft Yoga Scrub Pant?

templates.content: Happy to help! Would you mind sharing your usual size? I would recommend using the "What's my size?" tool on each product page to find the best fit. Every product page also includes a Size Guide. The Size Guide breaks down sizing by measurements (such as chest, waist, and hips) and provides details on how each product is intended to fit.
templates.name: Sizing
